MD = 1000000007
P = [[0 for x in range(1001)] for y in range(1001)]
P[1][1] = 1
for n in range(2, 1001):
    for w in range(1, n + 1):
        P[n][w] = (P[n - 1][w - 1] + w * P[n - 1][w]) % MD
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    N = int(input())
    tot = 0
    for w in range(1, N + 1):
        tot += P[N][w]
    r = tot % MD
    print(r)
